Detailed Description

Author:
Oliver Regenfelder

Adjust the modulation level of the AS3911 based on the amplitude or phase of the reader field.

Define Documentation

#define AS3911_DCT_IRQ_SANITY_TIMEOUT   5

Sanity timeout for the AS3911 direct command completed interrupt.

Function Documentation

int as3911GetInterpolatedValue ( int  x1,
int  y1,
int  x2,
int  y2,
int  xi 
)
Note:
x1 must be <= x2.

Calculate the linear interpolated value at xi. The curve for the linear interpolation is defined by (x1, y1) and (x2, y2). For values xi below x1 the function will return y1, and for values xi above x2 the function will return y2. For any intermediate value the function will return y1 + (y2 - y1) * (xi - x1) / (x2 - x1).

Parameters:
[in]x1X-coordinate of the first point.
[in]y1Y-coordinate of the first point.
[in]x2X-coordinate of the second point.
[in]y2Y-coordinate of the second point.
[in]xiX-coordinate of the interpolation point.
Returns:
The interpolated Y-value at xi.
